segments.text: This is your song . I picked it for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . You are so considerate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Push the red button on the mike to turn it on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . This key is too high for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it's a piece of cake for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Let me have a try ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well done ! I hope I can sing as well as you one day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I'm sure you will .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so . Thank you for saying so .
segments.speaker: S1
